meanings.definition: (Latin) I lead away, take away, carry off, abduct
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) I lead away, take away, carry off, abduct.

examples.translation: I led her away to the villa.
examples.note: Example sentence showing the verb in action.

usage_notes.explanation: This is a Latin verb. It is the first-person singular present active indicative form of *abduco*.

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin verb, so readability depends on Latin proficiency.
